verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:66
verses.text: And the residue of the families of the sons of Kohath had cities of their coasts out of the tribe of Ephraim.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:67
verses.text: And they gave unto them, of the cities of refuge, Shechem in mount Ephraim with her suburbs; they gave also Gezer with her suburbs,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:68
verses.text: And Jokmeam with her suburbs, and Beth–horon with her suburbs,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:69
verses.text: And Aijalon with her suburbs, and Gath–rimmon with her suburbs:

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 6:70
verses.text: And out of the half tribe of Manasseh; Aner with her suburbs, and Bileam with her suburbs, for the family of the remnant of the sons of Kohath.
